languagesList: 🌍 Choose your interface language. This is not the audio language — it will be detected automatically.

startLanguageSet: Welcome! I’m a bot that converts audio and voice messages into text. Just send a voice message or an audio file — I’ll transcribe it and send you the text.
transcribeStart: Please wait while we process your audio file. This will take a couple of minutes!
transcribeStartWithInfo: 🎵 Name: {fileName} ⏱ Duration: {duration} Please wait while we process your audio file. This will take a couple of minutes!
unsupportedFormat: This audio format is not supported yet.
